airQuality.description: Air quality is acceptable, however some pollutants may be a concern for a small number of people
airQuality.healthImplications: Minor health implications for sensitive individuals

carbonMonoxide.description: Carbon monoxide - a colorless, odorless gas that can be harmful when inhaled

nitrogenOxide.description: Nitric oxide - a gas that contributes to air pollution

nitrogenDioxide.description: Nitrogen dioxide - a gas that can irritate the lungs

ozone.description: Ozone - a gas that can cause respiratory problems

sulfurDioxide.description: Sulfur dioxide - a gas that can irritate the respiratory system

particulateMatter25.description: Fine particulate matter - tiny particles that can penetrate deep into the lungs

particulateMatter10.description: Coarse particulate matter - larger particles that can irritate the respiratory system

ammonia.description: Ammonia - a gas that can contribute to air pollution

recommendations.general: Air quality is acceptable, however some pollutants may be a concern for a small number of people
recommendations.health: Monitor symptoms if you have respiratory conditions
